verbs.description: [ARG1: sixth - grader] [V: dies] [ARGM-TMP: after collapsing during p e at middle school in rancho palos verdes] a sixth - grader died tuesday after collapsing during a physical education class at dodson middle school in rancho palos verdes school staff declined to answer questions about the incident but the los angeles unified school district released the text of a recorded message sent to parents dodson middle school school middle school sarah aiello los angeles unified school district rancho palos verdes california kathleen miyamoto
